channel.title: Need help with tast vengeance

item.title: Need help with tast vengeance
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

public boolean canVengeance;

case 51039: if (playerLevel[6] < 94) { sendMsg("You need to have 94 or higher magic to cast Vengeance!"); } else if (canVengeance) { sendMsg("You already have the vengeance spell casted."); } else if (actionDelay > 0) { sendMsg("You can only cast vengeance spells every 30 seconds."); } else if (actionDelay < 1 && playerLevel[6] > 93) { if (playerHasItemAmount(560, 2) && playerHasItemAmount(557, 10) && playerHasItemAmount(553, 3)) { delete(560, 2); delete(557, 10); delete(553, 3); actionDelay = 60; canVengeance = true; gfx(644); addSkillXP(112, 6); anim(1914); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMsg("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } } break;

public void Hit(int i1) { hitDiff = i1; hitUpdateRequired = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

if (Atk.canVengeance && hitDiff != 0) { Hit((int)(hitDiff / 1.2)); Atk.canVengeance = false; Atk.txt4 = "Taste vengeance!"; Atk.string4UpdateRequired = true; }

Read full topic
